intentrecipientChannelId of the withdraw intent"},"intendSettle(bytes)":{"details":"simplex states in this array are not necessarily in the same channel,  which means intendSettle natively supports multi-channel batch processing.  A simplex state with non-zero seqNum (non-null state) must be co-signed by both peers,  while a simplex state with seqNum=0 (null state) only needs to be signed by one peer.  TODO: wait for Solidity's support to replace SignedSimplexStateArray with bytes[].","params":{"_signedSimplexStateArray":"bytes of SignedSimplexStateArray message"}},"intendWithdraw(bytes32,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"only peers can call intendWithdraw","params":{"_amount":"amount of funds to withdraw","_channelId":"ID of the channel","_recipientChannelId":"withdraw to receiver address if 0,  otherwise deposit to receiver address in the recipient channel"}},"openChannel(bytes)":{"params":{"_openRequest":"bytes of open channel request message"}},"snapshotStates(bytes)":{"details":"simplex states in this array are not necessarily in the same channel,  which means snapshotStates natively supports multi-channel batch processing.  This function only updates seqNum, transferOut, pendingPayOut of each on-chain  simplex state. It can't ensure that the pending pays will be cleared during  settling the channel, which requires users call intendSettle with the same state.  TODO: wait for Solidity's support to replace SignedSimplexStateArray with bytes[].","params":{"_signedSimplexStateArray":"bytes of SignedSimplexStateArray nodes.documentation: *** events ****
nodes.name: OpenChannel

confirmSettle(bytes32).details: This must be called after settleFinalizedTime

params._channelId: ID of the channel

confirmWithdraw(bytes32).details: anyone can confirm a withdrawal intent

params._channelId: ID of the channel

deposit(bytes32,address,uint256).details: total deposit amount = msg.value(must be 0 for ERC20) + _transferFromAmount

params._channelId: ID of the channel
params._transferFromAmount: amount of funds to be transfered from EthPool for ETH  or ERC20 contract for ERC20 tokens

getBalanceMap(bytes32).details: Solidity can't directly return an array of struct for now

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

getBalanceMap(bytes32).return: addresses of peers in the channelcorresponding deposits of the peers (with matched index)corresponding withdrawals of the peers (with matched index)

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

getChannelMigrationArgs(bytes32).return: channel dispute timeoutchannel tokey type converted to uintchannel token addresssequence number of cooperative withdraw

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

params._channelStatus: query channel status converted to uint

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed

getLastPayResolveDeadlineMap(bytes32).return: peers' addresseslastPayResolveDeadlines of two simplex channels

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed

getNextPayIdListHashMap(bytes32).return: peers' addressesnextPayIdListHashes of two simplex channels

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

getPeersMigrationInfo(bytes32).return: peers' addressespeers' depositspeers' withdrawalspeers' state sequence numberspeers' transferOut mappeers' pendingPayOut map

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

getPendingPayOutMap(bytes32).return: peers' addressespendingPayOuts of two simplex channels

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed

getStateSeqNumMap(bytes32).return: peers' addressestwo simplex state sequence numbers

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed
ID of the channel to be viewed

getTransferOutMap(bytes32).return: peers' addressestransferOuts of two simplex channels

params._channelId: ID of the channel to be viewed

getWithdrawIntent(bytes32).return: receiver of the withdraw intentamount of the withdraw intentrequestTime of the withdraw intentrecipientChannelId of the withdraw intent

intendSettle(bytes).details: simplex states in this array are not necessarily in the same channel,  which means intendSettle natively supports multi-channel batch processing.  A simplex state with non-zero seqNum (non-null state) must be co-signed by both peers,  while a simplex state with seqNum=0 (null state) only needs to be signed by one peer.  TODO: wait for Solidity's support to replace SignedSimplexStateArray with bytes[].

params._channelId: ID of the channel
params._recipientChannelId: withdraw to receiver address if 0,  otherwise deposit to receiver address in the recipient channel

params._openRequest: bytes of open channel request message

snapshotStates(bytes).details: simplex states in this array are not necessarily in the same channel,  which means snapshotStates natively supports multi-channel batch processing.  This function only updates seqNum, transferOut, pendingPayOut of each on-chain  simplex state. It can't ensure that the pending pays will be cleared during  settling the channel, which requires users call intendSettle with the same state.  TODO: wait for Solidity's support to replace SignedSimplexStateArray with bytes[].

vetoWithdraw(bytes32).details: only peers can veto a withdrawal intent;  peers can veto a withdrawal intent even after (requestTime + disputeTimeout)

params._channelId: ID of the channel

deposit(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH or ERC20 tokens into the channel

getBalanceLimit(address).notice: Return balance limit of given token

getBalanceMap(bytes32).notice: Return one channel's balance info (depositMap and withdrawalMap)

getCelerWallet().notice: Return CelerWallet used by this CelerLedger contract

getChannelStatusNum(uint256).notice: Return channel number of given status in this contract

getEthPool().notice: Return EthPool used by this CelerLedger contract

getLastPayResolveDeadlineMap(bytes32).notice: Return lastPayResolveDeadline map of a duplex channel

getNextPayIdListHashMap(bytes32).notice: Return nextPayIdListHash map of a duplex channel

getPayRegistry().notice: Return PayRegistry used by this CelerLedger contract

getPeersMigrationInfo(bytes32).notice: Return migration info of the peers in the channel

getPendingPayOutMap(bytes32).notice: Return pendingPayOut map of a duplex channel

getSettleFinalizedTime(bytes32).notice: Get channel confirm settle open time

getStateSeqNumMap(bytes32).notice: Return state seqNum map of a duplex channel

getTotalBalance(bytes32).notice: Return one channel's total balance amount

getTransferOutMap(bytes32).notice: Return transferOut map of a duplex channel

getWithdrawIntent(bytes32).notice: Return the withdraw intent info of the channel

intendSettle(bytes).notice: Intend to settle channel(s) with an array of signed simplex states

intendWithdraw(bytes32,uint256,bytes32).notice: Intend to withdraw funds from channel

openChannel(bytes).notice: Open a state channel through auth withdraw message

snapshotStates(bytes).notice: Store signed simplex states on-chain as checkpoints
